pathAssistantSteps.info:
Before moving the Opportunity to "Proposal Sent to Customer" please verify the following is added to the Opportunity Products-

  • Billing Type
  • Commission Rate
  • Carrier
    • Please add Broker information if Carrier is Broker
  • Sales Price

Before moving the Opportunity to "Closed Won" please verify the following is added to the Opportunity Products-

For Direct Bill Products-

  • Coverage Limits
    • Effective Date
    • Expiration Date
    • Carrier Policy Number

For Agency/Agency - Premium Fincancing Products-

  • Coverage Limits
    • Effective Date
    • Expiration Date
    • Carrier Policy Number
    • Invoice Date
    • Invoice Number
    • Invoice Paid
    • Transaction Date
    • Payment ID Number
    • Billing Frequency
